titleStmt.title: Conversations written in French by Monsieur Clerombault ; and put into English by a person of honour.
Conversations. English
titleStmt.author: Palluau, Philippe de Clérembault, comte de, 1606-1665.
Méré, Antoine Gombault, chevalier de, 1610-1684.
Person of honour.

notesStmt.note: Another translation published in 1677 as: Conversations of the Mareschal of Clerambault and the Chevalier de Méré.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
